title: Argentina: Citi Launches an Exclusive Magazine for Its Citigold Customers
summary: Buenos Aires, Argentina – With the purpose of continuing to provide innovative benefits, Citi presents its new Citigold Magna magazine, a publication created exclusively for Citigold customers – Citi's premium banking program.
tag-1: Argentina: Citi Launches an Exclusive Magazine for Its Citigold Customers
tag-2: Buenos Aires, Argentina – With the purpose of continuing to provide innovative benefits, Citi presents its new Citigold Magna magazine, a publication created exclusively for Citigold customers – Citi's premium banking program.
tag-3: It is a magazine designed to meet the interests of clients in the most select and demanding Citi segment, and its contents will include columns about exotic travel destinations, interviews with world-leading entrepreneurs, recommended restaurants and an array of other topics. The publication, which is the first of its kind to target premium customers, will reach about 10,000 individuals and be distributed free of charge on a quarterly basis.
tag-4: "Citigold Magna magazine is a new endeavor that we created to add to our already exclusive benefits," said Eduardo Savastano, Citigold director for Citi Argentina. "I am confident that it will be a much-appreciated addition since we have devoted ourselves to ensure this publication will be able to accompany our Citigold customers in their lifestyle."
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
